mutants.original_line: letter = ''.join([c.lower() for c in words if c.isalpha()])
mutants.mutated_line: letter = 'MUTATED'.join([c.lower() for c in words if c.isalpha()])

mutants.original_line: vowel = ''.join([c for c in letter if c in 'aeiou'])
mutants.mutated_line: vowel = 'MUTATED'.join([c for c in letter if c in 'aeiou'])

mutants.original_line: consonant = ''.join([c for c in letter if c not in 'aeiou'])
mutants.mutated_line: consonant = 'MUTATED'.join([c for c in letter if c not in 'aeiou'])
